attributes.action: ban ownership of air guns without a firearms licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rachel Davies, Joe Cooke, Rhys Johnson, Andrew Morton, Daniel Marsh: Just some of the young people who have tragically died in air gun related accidents in the last few years. How many more need to die before the Government has the courage to ban such guns?

And that is ignoring the number of serious injuries every year and the number of crimes carried out using these weapons.

A Firearms licence would cover such circumstances as justify exceptions, for example licensed clubs and farmers but surely it is time to end common usage of air guns. 

It seems the Scottish Administration has the courage - what about England and Wales?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
